name: Tunalic
text:
I work for a real estate development company in Birmingham and we had a private event that required valet. I admittedly called a competitor first, but after leaving several unanswered messages decided to reach out to Magic City Parking. These guys answered quickly and were very professional.

After the information was relayed I received a quote via email and we proceeded with the agreed amount. One of the owners and two of his workers showed up a few minutes earlier than they said they would and got everything set up. They worked our event smoothly efficiently. The business owner even stayed the entire time.

John and Patton (owners) were great to work with and I was very satisfied with these guys. With no complaints from our guests and a smooth event, I will be using them again in the future and would not hesitate to recommend them to others.

name: Misty Joseph
text: First Class! Incredible night thanks to this group. Was very professionally dressed and wore a smile all night long. Even in the rain, they managed to continue their great work. Was greatly impressed with the service and timely manner in which they worked. Would recommend them for any event!

name: Whitney Butler
text: Patton and his team are extremely professional and were great to work with! They were on time and the communication up until the event was wonderful! The valet guys went out of their way to help assist our guests needs and I couldn't be more pleased with their service. We will definitely use them again in the future.

name: Chelsea Kennedy
text: If you are looking for a way to elevate your next event, you’ve found it! I worked with Magic City Parking this weekend, and they were professional, efficient, and friendly. As a wedding planner, I am all about the logistics and event flow, and this team of valets made everything run smoothly for guests from start to finish. I highly recommend Magic City Parking Systems!

text:

name: Tammy Watley
text: I've used TSI's home security services for over a decade and have always been satisfied. I recently upgraded my system and can't begin to express what a game changer this was! I love being able to arm and disarm my phone with a single touch on me cell phone, as well as see what's happening at my home anytime. This was well worth the investment and I wish I'd done this year's ago!

name: Terri Chiang
text: We just had the most pleasant experience with TSI Alarms. Everything went smooth from the very first call and speaking with Jackie to schedule the installation all the way until today where we met the most pleasant young man, David Madison, he made one of the most efficient installations we have ever seen, and then patiently took the time to explain everything about how this incredible new smart home system works. We cannot thank you enough David, you deserve great praise for a job well done!!

resp.text:
Thank you very much. This means a lot to us. We appreciate your business!
Sincerely,
TSI Alarms & Audio

name: Steve Preskill
text:
Never use these people, they have a contract. Which I get. But won't even release military family members who are PCSing.

They absolutely do not support the military

resp.text:
Steve,

We at TSI take our reviews very seriously. You signed the contract so you know there was one & they are very standard in our industry. TSI does support the military & we even offer a military discount. If you can provide documentation that you are being transferred outside of our service area then we would relieve you of the contract.

We also do not show you as a customer. Is your account in another name or are you speaking on the behalf of another customer? Or are you a competitor speaking on the behalf of a customer?

Sincerely,
TSI Alarms & Audio

name: Matt S
text:
Shady company ran by dishonest owners that will lie to you in order to keep your business.

TSI Alarms also lied to me multiple times by saying that equipment installed by them (Qolsys IQ Panel 2) can ONLY work with TSI Alarms, and that if I cancel my account with them the panel will become useless. I was told that this info came directly from the TSI owners. They also said my doorbell video and other automations (lights, etc.) will not work if I canceled with them. They say that no other company will be able to use the equipment and it will only work with TSI since it was "theirs". They say that you cannot buy the Qolsys IQ Panel 2 online, because it comes from their dealer. This is all false.

They will also tell you that they don't know if they are allowed to cancel your account and that they don't know how to cancel accounts (and you have to call alarm.com to cancel). After multiple times calling alarm.com, I found out that you do in fact cancel with the dealer (TSI), not with them (they are just a third party software company). The lady at TSI needed to speak to her supervisor (but they were conveniently gone for the day), and she would call me first thing in the morning about if they can cancel/how to cancel my account (wouldn't you know, they never called back, I had to call them). The next morning, my call was passed around to 3 individuals until I spoke to somebody who wanted to make sure I 100% wanted to cancel my account (for all the reasons above). My alarm.com account was gone less than 5 minutes after I hung up. It was a fun few days of conversations.

Edit: Thanks for responding M. Moore. I WAS a customer of yours, so I CAN leave a review on your company (I went to a different company because TSI is dishonest). Everything I've posted is 100% truth. You need to check your employees training if what you've read above is not how you want them interacting with customers. Shady.

resp.text:
Matt,

You have over complicated this entire situation. It is actually very simple. The cellular device that is built into the Qolsys panel is registered to our company, TSI. You would need another company to replace that device. Of course the Qolsys panel is available online to anyone that would want to purchase it at a retail price. All the other automation devices that were installed in the home are also universal and can be used with any other company. You were not told that. That was your misunderstanding. You were actually told that the automation devices would no longer be free because TSI would no longer be providing that service. That is an agreement between TSI, DR Horton & the Alarm.com builder program. You can’t just have some random company give you a free Alarm.com account. I would think this would clear up any confusion you have. Like I said it’s very simple. You would need another company to replace the device.

Also please do not reach out to TSI to assist or help you for any other reason. We take our reputation and reviews very serious. We also do not appreciate you, who is not a customer going online as you if you are and giving our company a 1 star review. You are not a customer & do not reserve that right. We have been in business for 21 years. I can also tell you that during that time I have never been accused of being shady. That is slander! You need to be very careful with your words. We are upfront and honest to a fault. We did not tell people what they want to hear in order to make a sale. We have lost many opportunities & sales over the years for that reason. The other company was willing to tell them what they wanted to here even though it was false and we were not.

Sincerely,
M. Moore
Vice President

name: Kimberly Brooks
text:
TSI is the best security system hands down. The whole team from owner Scott Moore to the receptionist is first rate. Questions are handled efficiently and effectively from first contact. My office (Farmers Insurance in midtown) has relied on the alarm systems provided by TSI for years.
They are my go to for recommendations to my clients.

name: Mary Ann Fye
text: Monthly fee is a little high but the company is willing to work with you on technical issues. This is a new account so I am hopefull it will be a good experience. I have heard they are better than some of the other companies out there. I love the sky bell! What a great feature and the app is easy to use.

name: Victoria Schumann
text: TSI is the best security system you can get. I’ve had TSI for years and have never been disappointed. The staff are some of the most friendly people I’ve met. I wish I could give them more than 5 stars!

name: Lana Mosley
text:
I do not personally have an alarm with TSI but can attest to the owners of the business. They are good people who will provide excellent customer service and quality workmanship. They are compassionate, caring and concerned with doing the best job possible to meet your needs. If seeking an honest company to do business with select TSI.

Lana Mosley

name: Ricki Roberts
text: TSI is a great alarm service! Ms. Jackie is wonderful, she is always so helpful! If we have ever had a problem she has always made it same day service. I highly recommend this company!

name: patrick Hardy
text: I highlighly recommend TSI Alarms & Audio for ALL of & Your home automation, residential and commercial security needs. TSI is a locally owned private company with operating principles that include acting with integrity, establishing and maintaining win-win relationships, and owning the results. TSI is a company that I trust with rates that never increase.

name: Audra Warren
text: TSI is a wonderful family owned security company. I’ve had great service with them for over 3 years now. It’s very easy to use; and the best part is I feel safe, and protected in my home, and comfortable leaving town.

name: Corporate Square 1079
text: Probably the worst customer service I have ever experienced.  I purchased a business that already had their system installed.  I tried to cancel and go to a new local company, however they told me the contract was valid for another year and I had to stick with them or pay a penalty.  Ok, I'll do that.  Then I needed some service work done.  Forget it.  They take your information and it goes into a black hole.  Apparently your are required to follow up with them.  And you have to do it over and over again until you are lucky enough to get someone that can (help).  They will never call you.  After a few months of trying to get my problem resolved, they sent another company to come out and look at my equipment.  They tried to repair, but determined I need a replacement part.  I sent in the part, because it was under warranty a couple of months ago.  I still know nothing on whats going on with it.  The only person that knows anything is always out.  Buyers beware with this company.

resp.text: Can you please provide us with some more details so we can help resolve your issues. What name is account listed under?

name: Donald Smith
text:
My security system was 10 years old and in need of updating. I called Mark w TSI and he and Brandon did a really good job of installing me four new cameras w DVR and screen and reworking my outdated security pads. Great job, great communication and fair price. I trust these guys.We were rarely at home when they were there.
Great Company

resp.text: We appreciate the opportunity!

name: Larinda Moore
text: TSI is a wonderful locally owned company that has not raised their monitoring fees in 20 years. Their camera systems and home theater and audio are top notch as well! I would highly recommend them to anyone. They also don’t do high pressure sale tactics or door to door soliciting.

name: gaye mayo
text:
I would like to thank Mark, Jackie and the TSI Alarms crew for answering all my questions regarding my new alarm system as well as my new thermostats - it's awesome that I can do everything from my phone and especially when I am out of town.

The road techs have always been prompt and courteous and even came out to Orange Beach to check on the thermostats and after all that  it turned out to be the actual air conditioning unit -

Would highly recommend them to anyone looking for home security and trying to figure out what I can do next to make my home more automated.

Thanks again!

name: Tony Hines
text: Scott Moore and his team are top notch. They have the traditional security knowledge along with the leading edge technology. No DIY solution is going to bring you the peace of mind and real security that TSI and their team brings.

name: C Pace
text:
After having TSI Alarms (previously DRC Security) at my former residence for over 6 years, it was a no-brainier to have them at the home I recently purchased.  I called and was able to easily select and setup the equipment I wanted to install with their billing manager Rachel.

Rachel was beyond helpful in working with me to find a package of equipment that met my needs and my budget.  She ensured that I would have enough equipment to cover all of the home and to provide the wireless option I was looking for (so I do not have to have a land-line).  She scheduled a prompt installation that met our schedule with no problem.

On installation day two technicians Chris and Tony were sent to my home to install the system.  My husband was there to oversee the project and said they were both professional and courteous.  The techs cleaned up after themselves and ensured they discussed placement of all equipment with my husband so the alarm operated at its best performance.

If you are thinking of purchasing an alarm for your home I highly recommend TSI Alarms for their service.  Shop Local!

name: Pratt Team
text: The TSI staff was very helpful and patient. They fully explained what equipment I would need to handle the system I wanted to install and the different pricing options I could choose. I would highly recommend them to family and friends.

name: Gary Hand
text: Great company and an amazing value. The entire staff are always on top of things, any questions I've asked they were able to answer quickly.

name: Shana Jordan
text: My family loves being able to use a locally owned company to secure our home.  TSI is always quick to respond and extremely friendly!

name: Mark Minnaert
text: Great company to work with  Very knowledgeable  Was able to access my current system and give me the upgrades I wanted with no fuss  Highly recommend

name: marcia Martin
text: Tsi did a wonderful job on my new security system. Im am very happy with the service i received

name: Glenn Ramskog
text: I could not be happier with TSI. Thier expertise with them helps life not have to be complicated with thier equipment

name: Cathy Matter
text: 5 stars! This is a fantastic company! The people are fantastic to work with!

name: Shelli Bell
text: TSI is family owned and operated and it shows in the attention to quality customer service. You want them to be in charge of your security!

name: Derek Brignac
text: I used TSI alarms for my home security system after being contacted by one of their sales reps. 1 month into their service after installation the system quit working. Took approximately 1 month to get a tech to my house to fix the issue. System shorted out. The tech fixed the problem, but after another month the system quit working once again. Called multiple times to get it worked on again, but they could never come at a reasonable time. Ex. TSI tech would call me on a Wednesday at 3pm and tell me they would be at my house the following day at 11am to work on it. I do not know about them but my job does not allow me to take off work like that. After that we were never able to get them to come even though I was still being charge monthly for the monitoring service that I was not getting due to the system not working. Now I owe them for several months of service that I never received. My advice is to stay away from TSI and use ADT or other top carriers.

name: Michelle Watts
text: We have enjoyed our service, our sales rep and the installers.

name: David Langham
text: A+. Would highly recommend!

name: Chase Connell
text: After having several issues with our Security cameras,  they are fully functional and working properly. TSI Alarms came and fixed all of our problems without charging me.

name: Janice Files
text:
One month after having this system installed my panel goes off every 60 seconds at 9 pm. Customer service says I have to call back in the morning; the office is closed.

** yes, I am a new customer of only one month and just got off the phone with your office. **  update -   I had faulty equipment - tech repaired and so far it is working again

resp.text:
We cannot find you in our database as a customer? Can you please give us more information? We want to make sure you have the right company.

Thanks,
TSI Alarms & Audio

name: Steve Lewis
text: I have had TSI for 20 years & I highly recommend!

name: Tom Stanford
text: Not trustworthy! You have been warned!

resp.text:
Mr. Hillman,

We need some more information. We have gone through all our databases and cannot find you as a customer. Would your account be associated with another name? Can you please provide us some more information so we can figure out what your issue is? We also want to verify that you have the right company.

Sincerely,
TSI Alarms & Audio

Mr. Hillman,

We are still awaiting your response. We will assume at this point you have no business or association with TSI. Please enlighten us otherwise.

Sincerely,
TSI Alarms & Audio

name: rachel cauldwell
text: Great customer service and staff!

name: Elaine Taylor
text: Great company to work with!

name: Tranay Tanner
text: Customer Service support is Terrible with this company.

name: Brian Lombardino
text: I would highly recommend this company.  The staff is professional, responsive, and reliable.  The director of operations, Jarrett, has always followed through with any and all of our security needs.  They made a promise to protect us and they have followed through with that promise.

name: Rachael Meckl
text: Trident Security is hands down the best in the business. They are reliable, honest, and dependable. All of the security guards are professional and take pride in the service they provide. Everyone that works for Trident are all extremely responsive and they will take the time to listen and make sure your security needs are handled. I appreciate their willingness to take on any job, no matter how big or small. If you are looking for a security company that will give you peace of mind, Trident Security should be your number one choice!

name: Gena Crook
text: Two guards from Trident worked for us at a local neighborhood swimming pool July 4th event.  This event is heavily attended every year.  Trident provided peace of mind for all of us in the parking lot and on the pool grounds.  The guards were friendly and professional.  In addition to  unobtrusively keeping a watch for safety issues the guards also gave us advice on how to improve the general safety of our pool facility.  We will definitely be hiring them again in the future when crowds are expected at pool events.

name: William Tranter
text: Jeff Still and Trident Security Solution worked with the Whitman - Hanson Regional School District to review school safety and security procedures and policies. The professionalism and knowledge of Mr. Still provided our administrative team with specific and cost effective ways to enhance our security protocols. We are very pleased with the working relationship we have built with Trident Security Solution.

name: Jay Rainey
text: The security consulting and training exercises conducted for our staff by Trident Security Solutions are making our school safer for students by preparing our faculty and staff for potential crisis situations. Trident’s decades of experience in security solutions are a great asset to the North Alabama community, and I am looking forward to our continued partnership.

resp.text: Thank you Mr. Rainey. We are proud to be working with an organization so dedicated to their safety and security. We look forward to supporting you into the future.

name: Mary Kate Schonhoff
text: Most professional Security company I have ever worked with!

name: Claudis Brown
text: They get the job done every time.

name: Rebecca Avant
text: Awesome peoples love them♥♥

name: Johnny Brascom
text: Primerica is an opportunity for anyone who is seeking an education to help their family to become properly protect, debt-free, and financially independent.

name: Patrick Coiner
text: I am educated and after my retirement from Active Army I moved directly into law enforcement. Afterwards, Corporate Security and then with Securitas as a Security Officer. I have been treated with dignity and respect from our client as well Securitas Leadership Teams with very little to say negatively. There are issues I have encountered with Securitas. However, our Supervisor has made it her professional mission in life to take care of her officers and our client. She is determined to keep "outstanding" her watchword. I am very enthused and upbeat with how we are making a difference. One Team; One Fight; One Future.

name: Robert Grace
text: Securitas is one of the best companies I’ve ever worked for. Being retired and on social security. This job has been a ideal supplement to my income. The staff you work with are a majority of retirees. So they come from all backgrounds. In addition there are a lot of military veterans. All of this spells responsible and mature. The management does back flips to help you out in scheduling and support. This is my first security position and I feel we get a tremendous amount of respect from our clients and all we come in contact with daily. The trust and confidence our clients gives us is truly one reason I enjoy and feel my job is important.

name: Erica Wright
text: I've worked security for a couple of companies over the years and it's my experience that there are issues across the industry. We don't get paid what we deserve to get paid, are frequently required to go above and beyond with little in the way of recognition, etc. But Securitas at least makes the effort to make sure we feel valued. They work with us with personal issues, and always try to have our backs with the clients. I've definitely worked for worse companies and I genuinely enjoy my work with Securitas, and the people employed with them, even if I wish the pay was better.

name: Jessica Halstrom
text: I’ve worked for this company for 5 years. I’ve never had an issue. Everyone in the office is very nice and they know me by name when I walk in the door. I am always paid on time and without error. Great company to work for :)

name: John
text: I have really enjoyed my time working for Securitas USA! They are a fantastic provider of security officers and their administration is top-notch! 10/10 would recommend to anyone looking for full or part-time positions!

name: Javion Drish
text: I am a current intern for Securitas Security USA and I love it here. I have learned so much since I began my internship this past August. The staff here is great and I look forward to everything that my internship will continue to bring.

name: Joe
text: I worked for this company for 4 1/2 years and There's no amount of money that could make me work for them again. This company does not value their employees. For the first 3 years I had to meticulously count and keep track of my hours because if it wasnt every single paycheck it was every other paycheck that was screwed up...complaining about a problem doesn't help anything...I had one raise in 4 and a half years and it wasn't due to my outstanding performance...it was because they raised starting pay..I caught an arsonist..didn't get so much as a letter of recognition for putting my life on the line for this company...Taxes are due at the end of this month and I still have not received my tax papers....and this has happened every year..I don't suggest going into the security business but if you do I would highly advise you to avoid Securitas.

name: Rafael Lewis
text: Securitas is a great company to work for! I have been working for a year now and I have no problems with my fellow employees. I never had any problem with my pay. I'll recommend anyone to work for them!!!!!!

name: dovahkiin 89
text: They let me go and didn't say anything about why they fired me but it was some great people I work with

name: Loretta Neaves
text: 40 years - paid on time - only recall one payroll error which was corrected the next week - good support from supervision - uniforms when I need them - appropriate training material to develop professional officers – equal opportunity – not a lot of opportunity for promotion, that however is the nature of the contract security world.

name: Barb Costello
text:
Professional interaction with the office staff.
Convenience of meeting times with management in the office.  Overall pleased with experience.

name: Marva Myrics
text: Excellent company to work for. Good training,comparable pay, and opportunity for . advancement.

name: Eunice Bell
text: I’ve been with Securitas for 7 years now, and they are a great company.

name: Brandi Washington
text: I’ve been with them for 5 years and have had a variety of sites.... they’re always dependable and accommodating

name: Mike Goins
text:
retired
20 years sales and sales management
Major account experience
district manager with 8 sales reps

dependable and loyal

name: Andrew Stephens
text:
Don't plan on getting paid on time.
You will have really shity supervisors, you will be fired for makeing complaints.Management is extremely homophobic, as well as completely useless in any regard.

name: Sandra Stone
text: i loved the job but when you get fired over a dam 20oz green tea that is taking alittle to far and i cant even get my unemoyment because of that

name: L*ndy89
text: Not a good company to work for

name: Cody Hardin
text: Stupid

name: Stephanie Agee
text: Everything was okay

name: Josh Hillman
text: Central Fire Protection handles all our fire sprinkler and alarm needs.  Great company to do business with!!

name: Ethan Sullens
text: Courteous, friendly and prompt service.

name: Hilario Rodriguez
text:
(Translated by Google) Chingó is my job

(Original)
Chingó es mi trabajo

name: Michael Hargrove
text: Pleasant, friendly and both office workers(Aimee and Leah)  are very helpful.

name: Tyler Alexander Bickford
text: Signal 88 is great company to work for they got a great team they very professional at what they do

name: Mark Robertson
text: The guards were well trained and I was able to reach a local manager to address any changes that needed to be made. Great service!

name: Demetria Pearl
text: Highly satisfied.  Signal 88 was referred by an acquaintance on short notice, and management set everything up on short notice.  The guards were prompt and very professional.  Very happy with service and will continue to use them for the foreseeable future.

name: Robert Welch
text: This place is vary horrible DO NOT WORK HERE poor management shows favortism and very unclear on schedules as well as they leave you in bad situations and the quote sergents tell you they dont have time for your problem your having they tell you if you have to use any force for a situation then you'll have to deal with everthing on your own i work or worked for this undercutting underpaying company i havent heard anything from them un weeks now and their app is screwing up my phone and they condone people fallung asleep at their post as if their there for nothing

name: Jacob C
text: Used to work for them. Technically still do since none of the managers like to get in touch with their employees or keep their word. I was layed off, i tried getting in touch with managers and supervisors about work several times. Even said they would contact me, i get nothing. Probably 3 or 4 months later here i am, still nothing. Not even a call asking for a resignation, even though i was probably the most loyal employee that they had. There was this "supervisor" i had, who would come and check on me, i believe his name was Mike, he got caught at home while on the clock , while he was supposed to be on duty checking on fellow security guards. To make sure they were at their post. And he got in trouble on multiple occassions. It took forever until discipline action was taken and he just got demoted. Then promoted again. Then demoted again. I worked hard and did what i was told. Showed up on time. And this is what the result is. So everyone, i do not recommend these unproffesional people.

name: Brain Trust
text: Very pleased with Signal 88 of Mobile!  Guards were very efficient and we had no incidents during the time frame that we needed security.

name: Justin Farmer
text: We had Signal 88 Security of Mobile conduct video surveillance for our business in relation to a private investigation case.  The results were amazing and I would recommend them to anyone wanting security services!

name: Sarah Wright
text: Poor communication skills. Very hard to contact unless current employee

name: Tony Hester
text: Sorry communication

name: Dale Williams
text: I actually visited a church located in the same building.

name: Dianne Richard
text: Installation techs were knowledgeable.  However we purchased a keyless entry/ exit door feature.  This was an option that was very important to us and so we chose a security company that offered it.  When the installation tech arrived I was told that it could not be installed because I didn't have a dead bolt lock on the door.  That I could hire someone else to drill a hole in my door at additional cost.  Already paid $2500 for this security system and now I have to hire someone else to install the door lock.  I  called the salesperson and was told that she could get her husband to drill it. But then he couldn't because he was out of town.  So  3 days later got the hole drilled but when tech came back to install it the lock would jam.  Tech said they never drill door locks.  ADS doesn't pay for that tool because it is so expensive. Very frustrating!  Be careful with the salesperson!  Finally works after spending hours adjusting the door and lock.  Use another security company. Not ADS.

resp.text: Ms. Richard, I am sorry for the installation issues your encountered.  Please call us directly if you have any other issues.  We will be happy to work with you to make sure you are a satisfied customer.

name: Steve Haynes
text: The individual who came out to do our upgrade was absolutely a top-notch customer service oriented individual. He very thoroughly went through everything with meAnd spent time explaining the changes. He was also extremely friendly and engaging. Very satisfied with his work.

resp.text: Steve, thank you for your review! We are glad to hear your upgrade went well and our team was able to satisfy your security needs.

name: TERESA VERRILLO
text: Very kind, prompt and informative. Highly recommend ADS. Installer went above and beyond to make sure everything was up and working well. Thank you

resp.text: Teresa, we are so glad everything went well with with your installation! We appreciate your feedback and we hope you enjoy your new system!

name: Reva Morton
text: When I call they are always helpful, and if I need them to come to my residence they are quick and friendly!

resp.text: Reva, thank you for leaving us your feedback. We're glad to hear your experience with our team has been great, and thank you for 7 years of business with ADS!

name: John Britt
text: Tech did a good job.

resp.text: John, thank you for your 5-star review! We appreciate your feedback.

name: Tom Pappas
text: From start to finish, the entire team at ADS was friendly and professional. Kim did a great job of designing our system and Jason’s installation was top notch. I highly recommended ADS for your security system needs.

resp.text: This is great to hear, Tom! Thank you for sharing your feedback with us! We appreciate your business!

name: Jim Parham
text: Installers were awesome, very neat and efficient!!

resp.text: Jim, we are glad our team was able to take care of you. Let us know if we can help you with anything else!

name: Duane E HILDRETH
text: Excellent company

resp.text: Duane, thank you for your 5-star review! We appreciate your feedback.

name: Karyn Turner
text: Very friendly and knowledgable. Jason Childers Thank you much... Recommended any time..

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us, Karyn! We appreciate your kind words!

name: Bob Reed
text: Quick response and professional

resp.text: Bob, thank you for your 5-star review! Our team appreciates your feedback.

name: Me stricklin
text: Pleased with ADS and technician, Jason,  who came out to add security to our garage. He was very knowledgeable, efficient, and respectful. Highly recommend Cullman ADS for home security needs.

resp.text: This is wonderful to hear Phyllis, we’re glad to see you're pleased with our work and enjoying being an ADS Customer! We look forward to working with you again in the future!

name: Mark Moon
text: Great technician, very knowledgeable and and patient with me being late to the house. Love my service and am glad to know I can count on ADS to secure my home

resp.text: Thank you, Mark, for taking the time out to share your experience with us. We appreciate you as a customer and thank you for choosing us to protect what you treasure most. We are here for you!

name: Melissa Riddle
text: Kenny was very knowledgeable! Great to work with and patient!

name: Bill Wilkinson
text: A perfect gentleman and 100% skilled.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words and review, Bill! We appreciate your business!

name: Janice Horton
text: I do not leave reviews, but Jordan said I would be getting an email to leave one.  For Jordan I will leave one.  He was very helpful explaining the working of the system he installed.  He was also kind to my 95 year old mother.  He was also patient, working with me to use the ADS app. I like the system that was installed, it helps me to check on my mother anytime, it is a relief to and to my mother and brothers. If we need help again, I hope it will be Jordan who helps us. Thank you Jordan.

resp.text: We really appreciate you taking the time out to share your experience with us! We are so lucky to have customers like you and we are glad you're happy with our level of service. Thank you for your business!

text: Professional and fast. This is a great company and I would recommend them for any home or business.

name: Robert Chappell
text: I am very pleased with my ADT security system! The techs are very professional and exhibit extreme concern that you are completely satisfied with their work before they leave. Excellent customer service!

name: Jay Starling
text: Our sales representative, David Jackson, quickly responded to the request to review our current system and provided several system upgrade options.  Our installer, Jeff, arrived on time and did an outstanding job.

resp.text: This is great news, Jay. We appreciate the love ♥️ 💕 💞

name: Joyce Boigenzahn
text: Thank you Scott for upgrading our home security system with ADT. We have used ADT for over 10 years and we have never had a problem. The tech, Scott was professional, polite, and very knowledgeable. He worked effectively and efficiently, answering all of my questions (I had alot) and even taking extra time to explain future upgrades. Thank you ADT and Scott.

resp.text: Thank you for being a member of the ADT family, Joyce, and for taking the time to share your awesome experience.

name: jeffery davis
text: No stars, I would not reccomend ADT anyone.   Worst customer service ever!

resp.text: Hello Jeffrey- We are so sorry to hear about your experience. We would love to help you. Please reach out to us at alwaysthere@adt.com for further assistance.

name: Shellie Weaver
text: Michael had exceptional customer service. He was efficient and attentive to all of our needs. When it came to providing an experience for us he went above and beyond. We would highly recommend him to anyone!! Job well done!!

name: Monica
text:
My ADT representative did an outstanding job. He went over several packages to ensure I knew my options. Working with David, I feel safe and secure. He answered all the questions I had and walked me through everything I needed. I will recommend Mr. Jackson's services to others.

Update: I gave Mr. Jackson a referral to one of my friends and he criticized him on his credit without knowing if he was a victim of identity theft. Change the rating from 5 stars to 2 stars

name: L Craig
text: Excellent service, quick install and has been a positive experience so far. My account representative took the time to make sure I had all that I needed and that I understood all of my equipment. I feel secure and I am very happy with ADT. Highly recommend their service and my representative David.

name: Jan Kimble
text:
David Jackson was the sales representative from ADT. Mr. Jackson is very knowledgeable about the service I requested . He was highly efficient, arrived promptly for each scheduled visit and answered all of my questions. Very professional.

.

name: Joyce SIMMONS
text: I am absolutely satisfied with the services I received from ADT Sales Representative David Jackson.  From the beginning till completion of installation.  David was thorough as well as PATIENT with me.  I had many questions but he answered them all.  I felt safe and comfortable with David.  He was extremely professional and knows his products well.  I will without hesitation recommend him to others.

name: Carolyn Howze
text: We've had ADT since becoming homeowners 5 years ago. Jonathan Givens is our awesome technician! He is very knowledgeable and we have had all positive experiences with his services. We are blessed to have him servicing our system and answering any questions we might have.

name: Matt Campbell
text: David Jackson, I greatly appreciate you sitting down with me and discussing the different types of products that ADT has to offer.  Purchasing something significant can be a very hard decision for most people, but having a professional like Mr. Jackson there to  assess the situation accurately is very helpful. Thank you for helping get my set up done as soon as possible. I do not know what kind of wand Mr. Jackson has under his sleeve, but it must be  really good because he was able to get me on the install schedule extremely fast. I recently had an issue so I wanted to secure my property and feel safe at home once again. ADT has an excellent set of products, many cameras and motion sensors, window monitors, temp controls, etc. What I like so far about the set up is that I can view all of the security on my phone and also on any computer.  I am looking forward to hearing from Mr. Jackson in the future and I hope to have a fantastic relationship with ADT. Thank you

name: J Renzenburger
text: ADT Technician Jacob Bohannon was extremely quick and efficient. He had our system installed in no time and was very helpful explaining the features. Please be sure he is recognized for his outstanding attitude and great customer service, he is a real asset for ADT.

name: Thaddeus Porter
text: Fantastic customer service.  Very fast, very professional, and very knowledgeable!

name: Lisa Nicholas
text: It was shared to me the system and how it work. The agent was understanding and gave details of the system.

name: Sharity Scott
text: You can't go wrong with Scott Chamblin! He updated our ADT system flawlessly. He was a true professional, very competent and proficient at his job. Once installs were complete, he was very patient with us while ensuring we could work the new system. We were very satisfied with the results. Will request him by name for any future services. Thanks Scott!

name: Sherrie Shown
text: ADT has kept me feeling safe and secure for over 11 years.  The company is very customer oriented and will go above and beyond to see that everything is exactly to your liking.

name: Tamara Myers
text: Thank you David for all your help. You made sure to explain to me about ADT and what services they provided.

name: Andrea Bach
text: Great customer service always there for any questions.

name: Linda Barsczewski
text: We recently had an ADT tech, Jonathan Givens, at the house to assist us with an issue regarding our exterior security camera. Jonathan immediately knew what was causing the problem and was able to resolve it. He was professional, courteous and very knowledgeable. We sincerely hope that all ADT techs are like Jonathan... Thank you ADT and Jonathan!!! Job well done!

name: Bobby Ford
text:
My experience with ADT was outstanding.  I have nothing but great things to say about the service that I received from both the service agent (Ms Morgan Hamel), and the technician that installed the ADT system.  Accolades to both of your employees for outstanding service.  I end with big thank you to Ms Morgan for taking time to explain the different options and to help me select the best package to fit my requirements. The technician was great and he took the time to go over and familiarize me with each component on the system.   Thanks again and may God Bless....
Bobby L  Ford

name: Chip Westberry
text: We have been using ADT security services for many years.  We recently completed an addition to our home and needed additional equipment.  David Jackson drove down from Montgomery to help us determine what equipment would best cover our needs.  He and James House were very knowledgeable and helpful.  We are very pleased with the results.

name: Thomas Susi
text: Service technician Jonathan Givens did a great job. Took his time and explained the system to this elderly couple. We are not that computer savvy so he was patient with us. Kind, polite and was on time.

name: James M. Levy
text: David did an exceptional job. He is friendly, professional and answered every question I had. Additionally, he cleaned up any mess made. I strongly and happily give him and ADT 5 stars!!

name: Wendy Gay
text: We've had ADT for many, many years and David in Montgomery was by far one of our best reps.  He is very detailed and customer focused.  And wants only the best for me (customer).

name: Michelle S
text: Jonathan Givens was my technician today, he was very prompt and was able to address my issue and get me back up and running in minutes.  He was excellent with my rescue dogs and explained what was going on along with the fix.  Only thing ADT needs to work on it length it takes to get a technician when a customer has a problem.  Waited about 2 weeks for appointment and in and out in like 30 minutes.  Jonathan Givens is a huge asset to your company and I tell all my friends about ADT and Jonathon.

name: Francine Anderson
text: I am so very happy I chose ADT for my home security. ADT Technician Scott Chamblin was the individual who came out to my home and he was so very informative and knowledgeable about the  company’s products and services.   Before leaving, Scott made sure that my new system was properly working and that I knew how to operate it along with the new features.  ADT, thank you for your protection and for sending such an outstanding technician to initiate your services.

name: Gina Griffin
text: Jonathan Givens was amazing.. i was initially told my appointment would be Friday but Jonathan saw that he was within 10 miles of my house and called me to see if he could come a few days early. This was such a blessing because i live alone and i depend on my security system. Thank you Jonathan

name: Joshua Carlson
text: Got Jacob to set up our ADT alarm - he was exceptionally helpful and quick. Would definitely request him by name if we got more work done.

name: Kathy Perreault
text: Jonathan Givens, the technician who installed our ADT security system, was very knowledge and helpful. He was very patient as he guided us through the operation of the system. We were glad to hear that we can contact him directly if we have a question or a problem in the future.

name: Yvette Esteves
text: Mr. Givens arrived on time like always. He was on task right away. Mr. Givens updated our cel unit and successfully fixed ALL our Z-Wave switches. We appreciate his professionalism.

name: Phillipian 4:10
text: Scott Chamblin was perfect. He came in to upgrade our system and was professional and efficient.  He reviewed the entire system with our family, he was patient and thorough. Grateful for this type of customer service experience.

name: Taye moore
text: Terrible. They will give you a 5 hour window and be a no show.  say they tried to call and reschedule you for 2 weeks later.  Try another company.

resp.text: Hello Tay- We are disappointed to hear of your experience. We are happy to help you. Please reach out to us at alwaysthere@adt.com. Please provide us with your phone number, address and please reference your post.

name: Leslie Strappy
text: David has been awesome getting everything ready for me and also instrumental and helping me getting personal specifications set up on my new system.  This has been a smooth transition because of David.

name: Anthony Barnes
text: Mr. David Jackson was very nice and informative,  great job

name: Samantha Podloski
text: Chris King was awesome. I love our system and he explained everything to me. He was very patient and helpful and answered all of my questions.

name: Edie Butler
text: Jonathon Givens has serviced our home issues several times and each time he has been professional, courteous, and genuinely interested in correcting all issues with excellent care.  We LOVE our ADT.

name: Yvonne McBeth
text:
ADT, I had the pleasure of meeting Dakoda Blietz today.  He had come to installed additional equipment in my home.  I just wanted to thank and praise him for a job well done. His excellent customer service skills, his professionalism,  his patience and his thoroughness was 5 Star.  He answered my questions, asked again if I had any more question.  What  really impressed me,  was how he communicated back to the  ADT.  He repeated back to the office what he understood them say during the conversation for clarity.  I am retired 30 years in the utility industry  in customer service.  I rarely hear or see such committed service to ensure the customer is taken care the first time.

Please thank Dakoda for me again!!!!

name: MIKE COSBY
text: Scott Chamblin was awesome! He was very Professional and on time. He made sure he answered all my questions and walked me through the ADT app, and made sure i had a full understanding of how you use my app. Thanks Scott!!

name: Kyle Nichols
text: Scott Chamblin was very helpful with our out of date system. Fixed us up with a new system and made our home protected. He was professional and personable. Overall, very pleased with our ADT service.

name: Anthony Channell
text: I have had my ADT system for 90 days.  My Security Specialist, David Jackson, regularly checks with me on my system to make sure everything is going well.  He is most courteous and anxious to make sure I love and understand my security system.

name: Robert Marshaljr
text: Joanthan Givens repaired my ADT Security system at 2452 County Road 112, Dothan, Al in a very professional matter.  He is a great person to work with  and makes sure your system working right.  He is very hard worker.

name: Vic Harris
text: David Jackson helped my mother Dr. Ella Bolling Harris, yesterday on June 19th 2019. My mother had been given the run around byanother representative in a different state and due to that was planning on leaving ADT. But thanks to Mr. Jackson's knowledge, personable attitude and professionalism my mother continues to be a customer and a deal was made that accommodated her needs.

name: Cyndi Harrell
text: Mr. Givens was an excellent ADT Tech. He answered all our question made sure we knew how to work the system. Great job

name: Stephen M. Wright
text: Scott Shamblin was a total professional.  He explained the tasks completed and answered all my questions.  His professionalism was evident from the time he arrived until the job was complete. Kudos to him.

name: Mary Evans
text: David, sales representative, is personable and kind. Set us up for ADT and technicians sent did a great job!

name: Ginger Hicks
text: Jonathan Givens was very professional, knowledgeable and helpful to me.  He answered all my questions and was very nice

name: Lynn Hale
text: David diagnosed the problem correctly, had the gear and hardware to fix it, and completed it without any fuss. Took the time to go over everything with me, and answered all my questions. Well done, David - Thank you

name: Mark K.
text: I called ADT to request service/repair of 3 year old system, which was installed by ADT. Telephone Representative very helpful in setting up appt. She told me that there would be no charge for the service call as our monthly charge includes the warranty. Service appt. was for the next day - very quick in getting an appt. Service tech - Jonathon Givens - had to replace two door sensors. He then proceeded to tell my wife that our system was outdated and needed to be updated. He offered to update it for a $100 fee. My wife told him she would have to speak with me first before we agreed to anything resulting in a charge. Jonathon then asked my wife how long had we had our system. She told him three years in our current home and approximately seven years in our previous house (total of approximately ten years with ADT.)  He then said he'd go ahead and update our system for no charge, which he did. What was that about??  Offer to update the system for $100?  Would that be considered fleecing a client? And if he was going to update the system for $100, does he pocket the amount, since he updated the system anyway. Kind of "sketch" as the kids say these days.  I have not been impressed with ADT monitoring services in the past, and only continued service with them after the 2 year contract (at which time they were going to increase my monitoring price $10/month.) They agreed to keep it at the same rate as long as I agreed to another 2 years.  When the 2 years are over, I'm finished with ADT.

name: Charles Hill
text: ADT was here on time.  Tech ( Dakoda Blietz) was outstanding.  Very Polite, nice & professional young man.

name: OLUSINA AKINDURO
text: Jonathan Givens was very professional, courteous and did an exceptional job in a timely manner.

name: Adnan Sabir
text: Extremely dissatisfied.

resp.text: Yikes Adnan!- We're very sorry to learn of your unsatisfactory experience as an ADT family member! Please email our team directly at Alwaysthere@adt.com with more info in regard to your issue and the full address in which the services are located, so we may help you further. ~ Thank you

name: Jay Williams
text:
I was an 11 year customer of ADT. I was excited to move to a new home and take ADT with me. Unfortunately my mom passed away the day before ADT was set to install. Even under all that pressure I remembered to call and cancel the install while I was out of town. I've been out of pocket for weeks trying to handle mom's business, grieve, and still live so I haven't had a chance to reschedule. ADT proceeded to still charge me two months of service at my old location even though they knew I had cancelled the service at my old house. When I caught it, the call center manager told me that they still bill you 30 days after you cancel. I asked about the other month and she said "oh we prorated that and took it out of your installation fee." So I prepaid $100 for an install that I didn't get. And they took money out of my installation fee for two more months before I caught it. All this while they say sorry for your loss but...at least we gave you back the second month. So instead of $100 back I got about $50. Even during our time with them we were paying several months during one of their glitches and they weren't even monitoring my home.

No more ADT for me. EVER. And I'll let everyone I know not to get ADT. There are other options now.

resp.text: Hello Jay. Our condolences for your recent loss! We'd like to look into your concerns further to help. Could you please email us the phone number and address associated with your account to AlwaysThere@adt.com? Thank you. -Andrew

name: Katie Roby
text: Scott Chamblin updated my security system today. He did a fantastic job of installation and instructing on the usage of the updated technology

name: Michael Washington
text: David was professional and helpful !

name: Alberta Giles
text: Excellent customer service.

name: Honey Badger
text: Tried numerous times too get in touch with someone about a job over a time span of 6 weeks. They just kept telling me to message a different supervisor every time. They don’t have the guts too make a phone call. Great way to treat your Veterans guys. Don’t waste your time with this company.

name: Jordan Safranek
text: The day my grandfather died they gave me write up for not giving them enough time notice for a call in then wanted proof that he died for me to go to his funeral. Even if you call in the 4 hours before your shift and have a Dr excuse they still write you up. The job itself is simple and easy but the management is a joke. They don't care about you as an employee

name: Victoria Lambeth
text: Okay security company to begin and start your career as an security officer especially if you have no experience in the field.They have good employee perks and benefits. They have very flexible shifts and always have multiple job vacancies open in different cities  I absolutely enjoyed working for this employer, however some of Allied Universal Supervisors who manage the clients' sites could definitely improve on their communication skills and try to better understand employees who have disabilities.

name: Ace Temple
text: awful benefits, hard to get time off even when you request a year in advance. high turnover of management and hit/miss whether you get paid correctly.

name: Tasha Davis
text: I love working for this company. The people are friendly and it's a great atmosphere depending on where your post is.

name: Aaron Mewhinney (Momo)
text: As a company they ensure professionalism as well as saftey to property and poeple

name: Reese Ryder
text: This One Particular Person Showed The Best Hospitality I've Ever Seen @ Any Establishment.

name: Steven f
text: Worked at the same post for four years use to be OK despite low pay but recently not getting paid for over time and I think we are on the 7th account manager this year alone

name: Fitzgerald King
text: Best Place to work

name: angela christenson
text: Adam was most helpful!!

name: Joe Tamper
text: Very unprofessional and management is horrible and management take things personal when you are voicing your opinion about certain things and takes u off the schedule

name: Jimmy Fisher
text: I have been working for this awful company for almost 3 months, and I have never had a correct paycheck, and they are over one month behind correcting it as I type this. One paycheck was only 2 dollars when I worked over 40 hours. DO NOT work for this company under ANY circumstances.

name: Jane Dope
text: Not worth the money

name: Willis Marbury
text: Great job recruiting

name: deedee dandridge
text: A very terrible company to work for

resp.text: Hi Deedee, please feel free to send us additional information to info@aus.com about your experience so that we may assist.

name: Kimberly Fowlerr
text: I was starting to feel unsafe in my neighborhood but these guys took all my worries away.. I was highly impressed by the extremely professional approach of the employees towards the job and they made the whole process seamless and easy to follow.. i had an excellent experience and would definitely recommend it to everyone 👍

name: Chris hemeke
text: I'm really glad I decided to go through with trusting this company. the entire process was easy and stress free. after completion I now have peace of mind when it comes to the safety of my home and family.  thanks again!

name: Carrie Vignola
text: Great company , cameras work great! I feel peace of mind knowing my home is protected. Friendly staff very responsive! Cameras look great in the home . Not bulky or big like some. Staff seems to care about thier customers. Highly recommend

name: Tony Baker (Success is Everywhere)
text: Super friendly staff. They were extremely professional and helped me understand all of their services. I highly recommend them. 5 stars all the way!

name: brian mcconnell
text: Friendly staff seemed very knowledgeable.  They listened to my needs and helped create a personal solution for me.  Lots of high tech products to work with a modern smart home.

name: Jhonattan Bonilla-Ramirez
text: I like the variety and the simplicity of the quote request stream. They do offer a variety of services as well where they are pros in the industry. Recommend them for sure!

name: Hope He
text: Wonderful people to work with! They explained the process and executed on my newly purchased home with perfection. I purchased the monitoring service as well and it has been nothing but wonderful. I have peace of mind for the security of my home, my children, and my cats!

name: Mustafa Muneer
text:
Great people and Great customer service!!!
I like that my house is secure without me being there and if anyone gets in. I have people behind the camera to let me know and report it to the police.
Ease of mind. Competitive prices that it is almost free. #livesmart

name: Andrew Glover
text: Professional service. They cared about my needs and respected my budget. I recommend you give them a try.

name: Sam Chen
text: Explained what it was that I was subscribing to and explained what the different devices were capable of. Very user friendly and very fair with their pricing. I would highly recommend.

name: John Smith
text: Been a pleasure doing business and look forward to further completing more deals .... A+ company well worth the money and time

name: Sebastian Sanchez
text: I wasn't feeling very safe in my neighborhood, but after one call all my worries went away. They gave me the feeling of security again. I couldn't recommend them more! Bless you guys. Truly.

name: Stacy Nguyen
text: Great company to work with! They were extremely helpful and patient with me.

name: Imran AK
text: Professional team, knows their work. Great to see quality work. I will be recommending more clients.

name: Malik Qasim
text: Wonderful service with wonderful staff.my house is secured now In my presence or absence. I recommend everyone this service

name: Houston Farmer
text: I highly recommend Living Smart.  Good quality cameras and professional staff.

name: Tereza Hollis
text: I had such a good experience with them! If you are ever feeling unsafe in your neighborhood definitely reach out to them, they will be super helpful and kind and set you up with the best security!

name: April P
text: The people I talked to were super nice and very informative!! I definitely feel more at ease knowing that my house is secure.

name: Steven
text:
Well within budget & professional 100%

Look forward to future endeavors

name: Cat E.S
text: A friend of mine suggested this place and I went a few months ago to get some cameras for my home. They were really kind and helped with everything and took in consideration my budget. I didn't feel pressured to buy anything. They suggested a few options and showed me de pros and cons. Really kind people and sellers!

name: yassine dribki
text: Excellent services. Highly recommended!

name: Elon Elezra
text: I am using their home monitoring service and I am very happy with it. 5/5

text: My experience is best than expectations.very friendly service with friendly staff

text: Nice people and very affordable. Thank you

name: Grand merchandise
